description: Detects the execution of the hacktool Rubeus via PE information of command line parameters
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - Rubeus Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\Rubeus.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Rubeus.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Rubeus") OR (process.command_line.text:("*asreproast\ *" OR "*dump\ \/service\:krbtgt\ *" OR "*dump\ \/luid\:0x*" OR "*kerberoast\ *" OR "*createnetonly\ \/program\:*" OR "*ptt\ \/ticket\:*" OR "*\/impersonateuser\:*" OR "*renew\ \/ticket\:*" OR "*asktgt\ \/user\:*" OR "*harvest\ \/interval\:*" OR "*s4u\ \/user\:*" OR "*s4u\ \/ticket\:*" OR "*hash\ \/password\:*" OR "*golden\ \/aes256\:*" OR "*silver\ \/user\:*")))
